DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Cognitive Training Through Exercise Following First Schizophrenia Episode
DOC.detailed_description: The Cognitive Training Exercise intervention consist 24 week systematic computerized cognitive training , 4 hour per week , plus aerobic exercise , 150 minute per week . The Cognitive Training Intervention include systematic cognitive training . The first 12 week involve neurocognitive training , use training exercise Posit Science Brain HQ . The second 12 week involve social cognitive training , use Posit Science SocialVille module . Aerobic exercise occur two 45-minute session clinic two 30-minute session home weekly . Intensity aerobic exercise tailor maintain individualized target heart rate zone monitor heart rate recorder . A weekly one-hour Bridging Skills Group member treatment condition design aid generalization training everyday life situation . The immediate target brain-derived neurotrophic factor . The primary treatment outcomes overall cognitive deficit level global functioning level .
